name: Flashing Police Lights
description:
Best pranking app of the year!
A great application that you can play with and have fun. Prank friends and family. Simple to use flashing lights, that could be turned on/off with a single tap. The app simulates police flashing lights. It is just a game. It can be used to entertain young children and to joke with grown ups.
Everyone can have fun and spend some time with family and friends.

Play responsibly!
